title: River of my Life
creator_credit: Amira Sabanovic and ACMI Digital Storytelling
brief_description: A digital story made as part of the ‘Diversity @ Work’ Program in association with AMES, Australia Post and SBS. Amira describes the course her life has taken - from the ravages of War in her homeland through to the hardships of a refugee’s life in both Europe and Australia before finding acceptance and fulfillment through a supportive workplace.
